sense.def:
Kadar človek
musters something
, zbere kar največ nečesa, na primer moči ali energije, da lahko potem nekaj naredi.

seg.quote: I hit him with all the force I could muster.
The group cannot muster sufficient working class support.

sense.def:
Kadar vojaki
muster
ali
are mustered
, se zberejo na enem kraju, da gredo v akcijo.

seg.quote: An enormous convoy mustered in the city.
